item.description:
Opening Mar. 11 - Disappearing America

Photographs of Nichols and Stone that Patricia Barry captured the last months and final days of the 150 year era in an artistic photo documentary that reveals the people, machinery, tools and intimate details that were left behind when Nichol and Stone closed in 2008.

Opening Mar. 11, from 6 p.m. to 8 p.m.Wine and cheese reception.
Members free, non-members $3.00.

Hello All!

Trisha has been working on this project for many many months- and it's finally on display. Show your support and come out to the show!

Cheers,
Donna

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Disappearing America Exhibit - by Trisha Barry (MeetUp Member)
